full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTIC Form approved Immigration and Naturalisation Service OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS: FILL IN WITH TYP FWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, Lilian En-tsi Chen , residing at 380 E Columbia st/P.O.Box555 (Name) (Street and number) Lake Alfred , Florida 33850 U.S. A. (City) (State) (ZIP Code, If in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 10-27-1909 (Date) at Peking, (City) (Country) China Also, answer either a, b or c, as appro- priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization 8347346 . (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship . If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number * 22 2. That I am 67 years of age and have resided in the United States since December 1956 (just before Xmas) 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 1405 Rosehillpr. Riverside, California 92507 MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO NAME SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT Jonathan C.H. Cheng M 64 Peking, China Married brother /sister 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That employed as, engaged in the business of Teaching I am or with School Board of Polk County (Name of concern) at Bartow, Florida and derive a net annual income of $13,000 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country $25,000 (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $25,000 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ , market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 380 E. Columbia, LK, Alfred valued at $30,000 9 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $7500 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $5000.00 cash surrender value of $ (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See reverse side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) WHOLLY NAME OF PERSON PARTIALLY AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME DEPENDENT DEPENDENT None Form 1-134 (Rev. 5-31-72) N
